body: @nhat2410 Okay, who besides you, is looking for well-written hentai? Having a good story is cool and all. But aren't we all here to fap? Shouldn't the art style and drawings be wayyy more important? lol

Well yeah and it's made for cruel people who don't give a fuck about feelings and come here to nut to these HENTAIS 😑. Don't judge me, I love the art and I  consider it art, an friction in HENTAIS verse. It's great own perspective whether u like it or not
I don't know much about female K-pop but it is really cruel to end someone's career like that
